entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Chipewyan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:38 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -33.7°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
